definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Absorption is also dependent upon air flow rates and the partial pressure of the gases in the inspired air.
sentences.chinese: 吸收也取決於空氣流速和吸入空氣中的氣體分壓。

sentences.english: Combat that with a small fan on your desk that will help keep air circulating in your workspace.
sentences.chinese: 要解決它可以用一個小風扇助你周圍空氣流通。

sentences.english: Also note air flow is from right to left.
sentences.chinese: 也要注意，空氣流是從右到左的。

sentences.english: Thewindows shouldbe open to allowthe air to circulate.
sentences.chinese: 我們應當打開窗戶以使空氣流通。

sentences.english: Attach the bung and the airlock, making sure to fill the airlock halfway with water.
sentences.chinese: 用水填裝氣密室以保證空氣流通。

sentences.english: Move it out of any confined spaces and give it about a foot all around for proper air circulation.
sentences.chinese: 招出任何密閉空間約一呎，給予適當的空氣流通各地。

sentences.english: It through continuous air flow make you feel more natural cool.
sentences.chinese: 它通過持續的空氣流讓你感覺更加自然的涼爽。

sentences.english: Numerous small mesh covered contact areas give outstanding air circulation around the back.
sentences.chinese: 許多小網覆蓋接觸面使背部空氣流通優良。

sentences.english: The large window makes the room seem airy.
sentences.chinese: 那扇大窗使這房間看來空氣流通。

sentences.english: So many Windows, accelerated air circulation.
sentences.chinese: 因此要多開窗，加速空氣流通。

sentences.english: Open the windows to let some air flow in.
sentences.chinese: 打開窗戶，讓空氣流進來。

sentences.english: Control valves are used to set the flow rate of air for gas burners.
sentences.chinese: 該控制閥用於設定氣體燃燒器空氣流速。

sentences.english: We should often open the windows to allow the air to circulate.
sentences.chinese: 我們應當經常打開窗戶以使空氣流通。

sentences.english: Maintain good ventilation by keeping the windows open and turning off the air-conditioning as far as possible.
sentences.chinese: 儘量關掉空調及打開窗戶以保持空氣流通。

sentences.english: But, the velocity of the inlet airflow is less influential.
sentences.chinese: 蒸發管入口空氣流速對蒸發率的影響較小。

sentences.english: Open the window and ventilate the room.
sentences.chinese: 打開窗戶，讓房間空氣流通。
